name: basketball Dunk: Hoop Shot
description:
Welcome , and thanks for choosing basketball Dunk : Hoop Shot , the best street dunk basketball game in the store .
this basketball game is full of attracting dunk animations and every basketball star have his own unique dunk style .
choose you star and play against many tough opponents , jump and score by smashing the hoop with many dunk shot styles .
you can score and win points to buy and recruit more stars to your team , change the ball or even the field , all this depends on you dunk style abilities in the game and how much your player is upgraded .
Jump and shoot the hoop by making your way to your oppenents hoop ,on your way in the basketball field your team mates will assist you buy blocking other players from taking the ball from you .
basketball Dunk : Hoop Shot is realy a fun game to play with your friends
Downlowd now it's FREE .
